TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi XPathMessageContext extends System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext

summary.span: Defines several XPath functions and namespace mappings commonly used when evaluating XPath expressions against SOAP documents.

span.span: Defines several XPath functions and namespace mappings commonly used when evaluating XPath expressions against SOAP documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 引擎具有完整的 XPath 上下文支持，并使用.NET Framework类中相同的方式实现此支持。The XPath engine has full XPath context support and uses the .NET Framework's class in the same way that does to implement this support. 是一个抽象类，使开发人员可以实现自定义 XPath 函数库，并声明 XPath 变量。 is an abstract class that allows developers to implement custom XPath function libraries and declare XPath variables. 是，因此也包含命名空间前缀映射。 is an and thus also contains the namespace prefix mappings. 筛选器引擎可以实现名称为 的 。The filter engine implements an named . 不但可以定义 Xpath 表达式中使用的自定义函数，还可声明多个常用的命名空间前缀映射。 defines custom functions that can be used in XPath expressions and it declares several common namespace prefix mappings. 下表列出了由定义的自定义函数，可以在 XPath 表达式中使用。The following table lists the custom functions defined by that can be used in XPath expressions. |XPath 函数XPath Function|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |正文body|返回的 SOAP Body 节点，无论何种 SOAP 版本 (1.1。Returns the SOAP Body node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1. 或 1.2）。or 1.2).| |标题header|返回的 SOAP 标头节点，无论何种 SOAP 版本 （1.1 或 1.2）。Returns the SOAP Header node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |correlation-datacorrelation-data|采用输入的字符串并返回关联的相关消息属性的值。Takes an input string and returns the value of the associated correlation message property. wsc instanceId 是保留的字符串用于基于上下文的相关。'wsc-instanceId' is a reserved string used for context-based correlation.| |messageIdmessageId|返回的 Ws-addressing MessageID 标头的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing MessageID header.| |relatesTorelatesTo|返回的 Ws-addressing RelatesTo 标头，而不考虑版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing RelatesTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |replyToreplyTo|返回的 Ws-addressing ReplyTo 标头，而不考虑版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing ReplyTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |从from|返回的 Ws-addressing 从标头的值，而不考虑版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0）。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing From header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |faultTofaultTo|返回的 Ws-addressing FaultTo 标头，而不考虑版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing FaultTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |更改为to|返回的值的 WS 寻址到标头 （如果存在），否则则返回匿名。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing To header if present, else it returns Anonymous.| |actionaction|返回的 Ws-addressing Action 标头的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing Action header.| |soap-urisoap-uri|返回的 SOAP 命名空间 uri。Returns the SOAP namespace uri.| |headers-with-actorheaders-with-actor|使用 SOAP 参与者 uri 并返回包含该执行组件，无论何种 SOAP 版本 （1.1 或 1.2） 的所有标头。Takes a SOAP Actor uri and returns all headers that contain that actor, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |执行组件actor|返回第一个子节点，无论何种 SOAP 版本 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 参与者 uri。Returns the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-mandatoryis-mandatory|返回第一个子节点是必需的无论何种 SOAP 版本 （1.1 或 1.2）。Returns whether or not the first child node is mandatory, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-actor-nextis-actor-next|返回第一个子节点的 SOAP 参与者 uri 假定任何 SOAP 版本 （1.1 或 1.2） 的下一个角色。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the Next role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-actor-ultimate-receiveris-actor-ultimate-receiver|返回第一个子节点的 SOAP 参与者 uri 假定 UltimateReceiver 角色，无论何种 SOAP 版本 （1.1 或 1.2）。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the UltimateReceiver role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |date-timedate-time|采用一个输入的日期字符串并返回转换为双精度的值。Takes an input date string and returns the value converted to a double.| |durationduration|采用输入的 timespan 字符串和总天数的形式返回值。Takes an input timespan string and returns the value as a total number of days.| |utc-nowutc-now|返回的值。Returns the value of .| 下表列出了由声明的默认命名空间和命名空间前缀。The following table lists the default namespaces and namespace prefixes that are declared by . |前缀Prefix|命名空间Namespace| |------------|---------------| |s11s11|`http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope`| |s12s12|`http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope`| |wsaAugust2004wsaAugust2004|`http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing`| |wsa10wsa10|`http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing`| |smsm|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/serviceModel/2004/05/xpathfunctions`| |tempuritempuri|`http://tempuri.org`| |serser|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization`|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括此类、 和 在内的多个类在内部使用 类来存储属性和元素名称。Several classes including this one, , and use the class internally to store attribute and element names. 当 XML 文档中多次出现某个元素名或属性名时，该名称在 中只存储一次。When an element or attribute name occurs multiple times in an XML document, it is stored only once in the . 这些名称存储为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象类型。The names are stored as common language runtime (CLR) object types. 这使您能够对这些字符串进行对象比较，而不是开销更大的字符串比较。This enables you to do object comparisons on these strings rather than a more expensive string comparison.

span.span: Compares the base Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) of two documents based upon the order the documents were loaded by the XSLT processor.
Always returns 0.
